input_text:
Job Title: Auto Technicians - McLarty Nissan of North Little Rock

Location: North Little Rock, AR

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
5703 Landers Road, North Little Rock, AR 72117

Automotive Service Technicians / Mechanics 

All Levels

Sign-on Bonus and Relocation for the Right Candidate!

Flagging 50+ hours per week!

$24 - $35 per hour! 

Expert Advisors know how to upsell and get you paid!

Multiple Bays Available

Climate Controlled

Top Techs earn Six Figures!

Bonuses + Great Benefits!

5-Day Work Week!

Nissan / Import Experience Preferred

Our expert Service Advisors know how to upsell fast, affordable services and keep the service drive flowing and get you paid!

Walk-in Applicants are Welcome!

McLarty Nissan of North Little Rock is hiring now for Service Technicians/ Mechanics All Levels – Nissan / Import Experience Preferred. If you are looking for a stable, successful place to grow your career as a Service Tech, come join our team. Are you ready for a promotion? We provide ongoing training so that you can receive certifications and move up in your career.

McLarty Nissan of North Little Rock has proudly been serving central Arkansas drivers since 2015. Our staff provides quality customer service to everyone who walks through our doors. We work hard to empower each and every one of our employees and foster a culture surrounding work-life balance and excellence. Generations of family values like respect, teamwork, and courage remain at the heart of our mission even today.

We offer:

Generous pay plan$24 - $35 per hour! Expert Advisors know how to upsell and get you paid!Sign-on Bonus and Relocation for the right candidate!Flagging 50+ hours per week!Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance. Paid Vacations and Holidays. Paid Time Off (PTO) from when you sign up401(k) pre-tax and Roth post-tax plans | Company match of 50% up to 4% of employee contributions | 100% vested after three years of service | Multiple fund options, investing advice, and personalized attentionEmployee discounts5-day work weekMultiple bays availableClimate ControlledNo Sundays


Responsibilities - Service Technician:

Accurately and efficiently perform quality repair and maintenance work that meets dealership and manufacturer standardsClearly writing and communicating what is wrong with the vehicle and the parts and time needed to repairRepairing broken or worn mechanical and technology componentsMaintaining repair and service recordsInstalling equipment, components, and systemsTesting vehicles both before and after repairRepairing electrical wiring, circuits, and fixturesOther duties may be assigned according to expertise and certifications


Qualifications/Requirements – Service Technician:

Minimum high school diploma or GED equivalent requiredTechnical or trade school training preferredNissan / Import experience is preferredMust provide own toolsAbility to be analytical and multi-taskSelf-motivated, enthusiastic presence in a team environmentStrong written and communication skillsConsistent and stable work historyValid driver’s license and clean driving recordProfessional appearance and work ethicUpload resume and complete online assessment for immediate considerationMust pass a pre-employment background check, MVR, and drug screen. Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. and be current residents. 


We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants are considered regardless of ethnicity, nationality, gender, veteran or disability status, religion, age, gender orientation, or other protected status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
